title: Fixes #27 (animation velocity too slow)
message:
Fixes #27 (animation velocity too slow)

This also significantly improves the loading time of the app, since now
the files, instead of being all loaded to memory at the beginning of the
app, they are "streamed" while they are being played. Not sure if this
will work in all hardware though.

Also, important to add that for some very very weird reason the
streaming method of playing files seems to be working ok in the supposed same conditions as when before it
didn't. This is referring to my Moto X 2013, that didn't suffer any
software update and still using the exact same version (branch) of
openFrameworks. Guess could be somehow related with the conjuction of
calls of .pause(), .stop() and .loadSound() methods.

title: Adds osx folder

title: Sets new folder structure
message:
Sets new folder structure

This is in order to avoid having one repository for each platform and with a lot of duplicated and difficult to update code.

With this setup, the common code, the src/ folder and resources (images and audio), are shared for every platform. On top of that there is still room for specifying platform specific settings and files. In order to keep the src/ code linked between platforms they are symlinked and this way a change in Eclipse in the android project for example is automatically reflected in Xcode for the iOS project, all of that keeping the version control changes centralized.

There is also a linking.sh script for symlinking everything easier.

title: Fixes #4 (changing from night to day takes a long time)
message:
Fixes #4 (changing from night to day takes a long time)

This is done using "busy loading", using to setup routines.
The first one is for drawing the splash screen.
Then with this one drawn in the screen already "busy loading" of the
sounds can be done without the user realizing and therefore not
degrading the user experience. Ideally though, this should be done with
a thread.

title: Major rewrite and refactor. Fixes #7, fixes #11 and fixes #12.
message:
Major rewrite and refactor. Fixes #7, fixes #11 and fixes #12.

- Can't trigger new sounds when in help mode (#12)
- Major refactor of code: way more readable, much sorter and cleaner
  too. (#7)
- Local and Banco now share most of the code instead of being duplicated
  on both sides (#11)
- Sounds renamed for clarity and in bin/sounds/ folder instead of in
  bin/
- Improved location of the data points, some were not really in place

even hurting. It does fix the mentioned issue though.
